text:
<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Form-Fields-are-far-too-long/idi-p/803410#M145494|I’ve created an Idea in the community please upvote if you agree>
<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Form-Fields-are-far-too-long/idi-p/803410#M145494>

Hiding modules on a per-template basis is handy, but it’s more scalable and (arguably) intuitive to hide them on a per-module basis. (Plus, allowlists!)
<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Control-Module-Editor-Visibility-on-a-Per-Module-Basis/idi-p/803685#M145562|[IDEA] Control Module Editor Visibility on a Per-Module Basis>
